Rulings.Tengu:
● The start of the Damage Step is before monsters are flipped face-up. 
● If this Set card is attacked, its effect cannot be activated.
● If one of those monsters does not return to the hand, the other also does not return.
Rulings.Goat: No rulings found for this card. Request new rulings at https://discord.gg/shVJnYJNpg

Rulings.Cat:
● This is a Trigger Effect
● This effect activates in the Damage Step, before a face-down monster is flipped face-up. (Therefore, this effect will not activate if a face-down “Neo-Spacian Grand Mole” is attacked. Also, if “Neo-Spacian Grand Mole” attacks a face-down Flip Effect Monster, you can return both monsters to the owners’ hands without activating the Flip Effect.)
● This effect does not target.

Rulings.Base: 1. This is a Trigger Effect\n2. This effect activates in the Damage Step, before a face-down monster is flipped face-up. (Therefore, this effect will not activate if a face-down "Neo-Spacian Grand Mole" is attacked. Also, if "Neo-Spacian Grand Mole" attacks a face-down Flip Effect Monster, you can return both monsters to the owners' hands without activating the Flip Effect.)\n3. This effect does not target.

PSCT.Tengu: ① At the start of the Damage Step, if this card battles an opponent's monster: You can return both battling monsters to the hand.
